index.metadata: Tejas Automation — Automation without the hassle

items.title: What We Offer: Ease of Use
items.description: State of the art solutions focused on operations and performance tracking. Our application empowers operators and organizations in taking control of their tank data.

items.title: How We Are Different: Cost
items.description: Our  platform was designed with support and feedback from operators looking to break down the technical and functional silos they were facing when operating their systems. The end result is a user configurable, technology agnostic solution which drives reliability and efficiency across the organization.

items.title: Why Choose Us: Accuracy
items.description: Speed up accurate reporting by up to 90%. Have complete awareness of your plant performance from any device, any place and anytime.

hero.title:
Tejas Automation
is dedicated to providing next generation enterprise tank monitoring solutions.
hero.subtitle:
Tejas is a tank monitoring solutions company small business company that combines expertise in water operations, environmental and process engineering, and software development to create environmental centric data management solutions.

Tejas patented technology is proven and award-winning. Our mission is to develop forward-thinking, scalable and affordable solutions and services for environmental professionals.

content1.title: Strong Field and Domain Expertise
content1.subtitle: The Tejas Automation team has substantial hands-on industry experience. We are well tuned to the needs of the market and understand constraints faced by our clients.

content2.title: Proven Technology
content2.subtitle: Tejas patented technology is proven and recognized.

content1.title: Features
content1.subtitle: Tejas has successfully configured hundreds of systems across the US including groundwater, surface water, wastewater and industrial processing plants.
content1.subtitle2: Tejas serves large and small systems. Our solutions are highly adaptable across industries and provides an ideal platform from which companies can grow and evolve.

items.title: Powerful Analytics Dashboard
items.description:
A BI dashboard gives a quick, visual snapshot of low-level tanks, product demand and overall delivery efficiency. Easily view, sort and filter tanks by any parameter to dynamically calculate and review market analytics.

Our interactive display with access to important KPIs will help you monitor activities, reach targets, and increase savings.

items.title: Enhanced Tank Details
items.description:
A customizable grid view displays tank details that include key metrics such as current gallons, available capacity, volume % and inches, temperatures, signal strength and battery level among others.

Modern user-friendly controls allow users to drag-and-drop columns to save that view or export date to excel for further analysis.

items.title: Historical Usage Trends
items.description:
Monitor usage trends, short fills, low alarms, and fill detection over any date range. Algorithms forecast Demand for each tank to show “days until low” or “days until empty” based on historical data for inventory usage.

Algorithms forecast Demand for key dates: Date to Order, Date to Safety Stock, and Date to Empty, based on historical data for inventory usage.

Analyze delivery efficiencies to maximize asset utilization.

content2.title: SmartTank
content2.subtitle: Tejas has successfully configured hundreds of systems across the US including groundwater, surface water, wastewater and industrial processing plants.
content2.subtitle2: Tejas serves large and small systems. Our solutions are highly adaptable across industries and provides an ideal platform from which companies can grow and evolve.

items.title: GPS Mapping & Tank Tracking
items.description:
Tank locations are mapped based on their GPS, Cellular triangulation, or physical address data.

Establish regions and routes to create route density and build more efficient loads.

Cluster visualization provides an interactive summary of tank alarm statuses by geographical areas. Quickly identify tanks with alarms status to prevent run outs.

items.title: Data Logging
items.description:
Set a fixed call-out schedule and detect significant level changes prior to a scheduled call.

Monitor demand by region to optimize routes and promote efficiency across your market’s supply chain.

items.title: Efficiency Reporting
items.description:
Measure delivery efficiency with real time visualization per customer and for the entire organization.

Compare fixed costs per delivery against average fill to better determine customer price.

Customize fixed delivery cost and delivery efficiency target for each customer for more accurate efficiency reporting.

content3.subtitle: Tejas has successfully configured hundreds of systems across the US including groundwater, surface water, wastewater and industrial processing plants.
content3.subtitle2: Tejas serves large and small systems. Our solutions are highly adaptable across industries and provides an ideal platform from which companies can grow and evolve.

items.title: Sales Tools for Customers
items.description:
Share visibility with customers to view tank levels and history online.

Customers can view or be emailed or sent by text the status and location of their delivery.

“Affiliated View” allows regional/national customers to view all tanks serviced by multiple suppliers.

Customize SmartTank portal and companion mobile app with your logo and colors to let them access current tank level, fill history, and usage rate.

items.title: Instant Download
items.description: Enjoy immediate access to your chosen templates upon purchase, enabling you to begin working on your projects without delay.
